Free.name: Suzume
Free.description: A 17-year-old girl named Suzume discovers a mysterious door in a ruined place. When she opens it, disasters begin appearing across Japan. With the help of a young man turned into a chair, she travels to close these doors and protect the world

Free.name: Your Name
Free.description: Two strangers, a boy from Tokyo and a girl from a rural town, mysteriously begin switching bodies. As they live each other’s lives, they form a powerful connection that transcends time and space. When a sudden disaster threatens, they must find each other before it’s too late.

Free.name: Bubble
Free.description: In a Tokyo where gravity has broken due to mysterious bubbles falling from the sky, parkour becomes the way of life for young survivors. Hibiki, a gifted but reckless jumper, meets a strange girl named Uta — and their encounter changes everything.

Free.name: Weathering with you
Free.description: A runaway boy in Tokyo meets a girl who can control the weather. Together, they start a small business bringing sunshine to people’s lives — but her gift comes with a heavy price.

Action.name: One Piece
Action.description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew set sail to find the legendary treasure, One Piece, and become the Pirate King.

Action.name: Black Clover
Action.description: Asta, a boy born without magic, dreams of becoming the Wizard King in a world full of magic users.

Action.name: My Hero Academia
Action.description: In a world where most people have superpowers, a powerless boy enrolls in a hero academy to become the greatest hero.

Action.name: Bleach
Action.description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and protects the world from evil spirits known as Hollows.

Action.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
Action.description: Yuji Itadori becomes involved in a secret organization that fights cursed spirits after swallowing a powerful curse.

Action.name: Naruto
Action.description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja, dreams of becoming the Hokage while carrying the spirit of a powerful demon fox inside him.

Action.name: Demon Slayer
Action.description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister who turned into a demon.

Action.name: Attack on Titan
Action.description: Humanity fights for survival inside walls to protect themselves from giant man-eating Titans.

Drama.name: 3D Kanojo
Drama.description: A shy otaku unexpectedly finds love with a popular girl who changes his life forever.

Drama.name: Oshi No Ko
Drama.description: A doctor and his patient are reincarnated as the children of a famous idol, uncovering dark secrets of the entertainment world.

Drama.name: Orange
Drama.description: A girl receives letters from her future self, urging her to prevent a tragic event involving her new classmate.

Drama.name: Erased
Drama.description: A man travels back in time to his childhood to prevent a series of kidnappings and murders.

Drama.name: March Comes In Like A Lion
Drama.description: A young professional shogi player struggles with depression and loneliness while finding comfort in a kind family.

Drama.name: Anohana
Drama.description: A group of childhood friends reunite to fulfill the wish of their deceased friend’s spirit.

Drama.name: Your Lie In April
Drama.description: A piano prodigy rediscovers his love for music after meeting a free-spirited violinist.

Drama.name: Violet Evergarden
Drama.description: A former soldier learns to express emotions as she writes heartfelt letters for others.

Fantasy.name: Mushoku Tensei
Fantasy.description: A jobless man is reincarnated in a magical world with all his memories, determined to live life to the fullest.

Fantasy.name: Overlord
Fantasy.description: A gamer becomes trapped in his favorite online game as an undead overlord, ruling his new world with absolute power.

Fantasy.name: Black Clover
Fantasy.description: Asta, born without magic, challenges fate to become the strongest mage in the kingdom.

Fantasy.name: The Rising of The Shield Hero
Fantasy.description: A man is summoned to another world as the Shield Hero and must fight betrayal and monsters to survive.

Fantasy.name: No Game No Life
Fantasy.description: Two genius siblings are transported to a world where everything is decided by games.

Fantasy.name: That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime
Fantasy.description: A man is reborn as a powerful slime in a fantasy world, gaining new powers and allies.

Fantasy.name: Sword Art Online
Fantasy.description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must clear the game to escape with their lives.

Fantasy.name: Re:Zero
Fantasy.description: Subaru is transported to another world and discovers he can reset time whenever he dies.

Comedy.name: Daily Lives Of High School Boys
Comedy.description: A hilarious take on the everyday misadventures of three high school friends.

Comedy.name: Asobi Asobase
Comedy.description: Three quirky girls start a club and get into bizarre, laugh-out-loud situations.

Comedy.name: Spy x Family
Comedy.description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepath pretend to be a family for a secret mission.

Comedy.name: Grand Blue
Comedy.description: College life turns into nonstop laughter as Iori joins a wild diving club.

Comedy.name: Nichijou
Comedy.description: A surreal and funny depiction of daily life filled with absurd events.

Comedy.name: Konosuba
Comedy.description: A boy reincarnates in a fantasy world with a useless goddess and an eccentric party.

Comedy.name: The Disastrous Life Of Saiki Kusuo
Comedy.description: A psychic high school student just wants a normal life, but chaos always follows him.

Comedy.name: Gintama
Comedy.description: An eccentric samurai and his friends take odd jobs in an alien-invaded Edo period.

Romance.name: Rent A Girlfriend
Romance.description: After a breakup, a college student rents a girlfriend, only for things to get complicated.

Romance.name: My Dress-up Darling
Romance.description: A shy doll maker and a lively girl bond over their love for cosplay.

Romance.name: Golden Time
Romance.description: A law student with amnesia starts a new life and falls in love, but his past returns.

Romance.name: Fruits Basket
Romance.description: A kind girl befriends a cursed family who transform into animals of the zodiac.

Romance.name: Kaichou Wa Maid-Sama
Romance.description: A strong-willed student council president secretly works in a maid café and is discovered by a popular boy.

Romance.name: Kaguya-Sama: Love is War
Romance.description: Two genius students try to make the other confess their love first in a hilarious battle of wits.

Romance.name: Horimiya
Romance.description: Two high school students discover each other's hidden sides and grow closer.

Romance.name: Toradora
Romance.description: A short-tempered boy and a fierce girl team up to help each other find love.
